amendment.description: Page 15, line 16, strike the quotation mark and final period and after such line insert the following: (3) ADDITIONAL FILING FEE- ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-409 to establish new filing fee for Reg S-K Forms to discourage frivolous filings.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
